content: संसद् {c1c} {c6c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To sit down, sit down together. {@--2@} To be afflicted, be in distress. {@--3@} To pine away.

संसद् {%<ab>f.</ab>%} {@--1@} An assembly, meeting, circle; संसत्सु जाते पुरुषाधिकारे <ls>Ki. 3. 51</ls>; छात्रससदि लब्धकीर्तिः <ls>Pt. 1</ls>; <ls>R. 16. 24.</ls> {@--2@} A court of justice; <ls>Ms. 8. 52.</ls>
